title: Outed
description: Outed is a coming-out MM sports romance and book 2 in the Off the Field duet. It is not a standalone novel.Aron Parker and Drew Rockland never expected to fall for each other when they were traded to the same team. While playing the biggest games of their lives, an accidental slip of the tongue in front of a teammate threatens to expose them before they’re ready.Wanting to prove to the sports world that who you love doesn’t change who you are on the field, the guys decide to come out after the season ends. As Aron and Drew get closer to their dream of winning it all, Drew’s ex drops another bomb that neither of them expects, and just as the guys think they have a handle on everything, an agreement is made that could change it all and threatens to tear them apart.For good.Off the field, they are just Aron and Drew …But maybe not everyone approves.
author: Kimberly Knight
